ie.gmit.sw.language_detector

Class FreqDistanceStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.language_detector.FreqDistanceStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LangDetectorStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CosineDistanceStrategy, SimpleDistanceStrategy

    public abstract class FreqDistanceStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements LangDetectorStrategy
    A language detector strategy which compares language distributions using some distance value metric.

      • findClosestLanguage

        public Lang findClosestLanguage(LangDist unidentifiedLang,
                                LangDistStore store)
        Performs this strategy on an unidentified language distribution and a store of known language k-mers.
        Specified by:
        findClosestLanguage in interface LangDetectorStrategy
        Parameters:
        unidentifiedLang - K-mer distribution of the unidentified language sample.
        store - K-mer distribution store for all known languages
        Returns:
        Closest known language using this strategy.

      • getDistance

        public abstract double getDistance(double[] distA,
                                   double[] distB)
        Distance between two frequency distributions, where smaller values = more similar languages.
        Parameters:
        distA - Distribution frequency from a language distribution.
        distB - Distribution frequency from a language distribution.
        Returns:
        Floating point value between 0 and 1, where smaller values indicate more similarity.
